description: Delete a job production plan location
permissions: User must be authorized to update the related job production plan (JobProductionPlanPolicy destroy? delegated via JobProductionPlanLocationPolicy), including admins, customer managers, broker members, assigned planner/project manager, or time card approvers.
side_effects: Deletes a job production plan location.
validation_notes: --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked when the job production plan location has dependent job schedule shifts.
